content.question: According to the author, what did "Cultural pessimists" (Paragraph 5) and "believers in the innate goodness of human nature" (Paragraph 5) have in common?

choices.label: Concern for the social status of artists
Belief in the influential power of art
Faith in the sanctity of artistic creation
Fear of the effects of art on morality

content.answer: Belief in the influential power of art

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
